about: I am a aspiring web developer at Life Choices. I am eager to apply my theoretical knowledge and passion for coding to kick start my professional career.
With a solid foundation in JavaScript, Java & Python. I am equipped with the necessary skills to contribute to software development projects.

skills.title: GIT & GITHUB
skills.experience: I have a decade of experience in web development using the following technologies: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JQuery, and Javascript. I am still building applications using the mentioned technologies.

skills.title: HTML
skills.experience: I have a decade of experience in web development using the following technologies: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JQuery, and Javascript. I am still building applications using the mentioned technologies.

skills.title: CSS
skills.experience: I've have been working on different types of databases since 2009, both SQL-structured and document-based. I enjoy working on a database; for me, that is where the magic happens. A well-structured database is the result of data integrity and many more.

skills.title: BOOTSTRAP
skills.experience: In case we want to secure, identify, and authorize access to a user on a specific resource, we need to have an API, which is a glue between the front end and back end. We can set up a lot of features or logic, such as middleware, database configuration, JSON web tokens, and many more. For the past 7 years, I have been working on APIs using Django and ExpressJS.

skills.title: VUEJS
skills.experience: When it comes to programming, I have a lot to say, but I will be brief. Programming and database management are the skills that will stay with me forever, even though it is my first time to come across another programming language. It is crazy how I knew it syntax before starting coding. I have a decade of working experience on the following programming languages: C++, Python, Delphi, Javascript, VB.Net, C#, and Java. I still want to learn more about them.

testimonials.name: Mzwakhe
testimonials.quotes: Mzwamandoda Louw is a highly dedicated and inquisitive individual with an unwavering focus on achieving project goals. During our collaborative work on a company website project, he consistently exhibited a strong commitment to learning and problem-solving. Even when we encountered challenges that seemed insurmountable, he demonstrated a remarkable willingness to go the extra mile and thoroughly investigate areas that required further understanding until he successfully grasped the concepts..

testimonials.name: Joel
testimonials.quotes: I am thrilled to introduce Mzwamadoda Louw as a potential candidate. Mzwamadoda possesses tremendous qualities such as being detail-oriented, hard-working, resilient, and a goal-getter. He is equally comfortable working collaboratively with his peers or independently to ensure project requirements are met. Additionally, he is respectful towards everyone and has a pleasant personality.To my personal opinion, this is the kind of candidate I would like to see grow in my company.

testimonials.name: Damon
testimonials.quotes: Mzwamadoda is a hard-working, driven individual who dedicates himself to tasks wholly. He is a well-mannered, honest man with a big heart, strong determination to better himself and is an absolute joy to work with.

testimonials.name: Taryn-lee
testimonials.quotes: Mzwamadoda is truly an amazing person who is always willing to help those around him ,he is both compassionate and kind .Mzwamadoda's work ethic and professionalism are impeccable and admirable.he is truly an inspiration to other around him..

testimonials.name: Anathi
testimonials.quotes: Mzwamadoda Shawn Louw is a happy and thriving classmates who loves studying.He is a well-rounded classmate who is doing well in all areas. He is very responsible,passionate,dedicated and enthusiastic in his school work. He knows how to communicate with his peers, kind, humble and he is always willing to assist his classmates when they ask for help..

testimonials.name: Ghamzah
testimonials.quotes: Throughout his internship, Mzwamadoda consistently demonstrated a strong work ethic and a thirst for learning. He actively sought feedback, eagerly embraced new technologies, and took initiatives to enhance his skill set. His commitment to self-improvement will undoubtedly make him a valuable asset to any software development team.I highly recommend Mzwamadoda to any organization seeking a talented and dedicated individual to join their team.
